description:
A Connection Token is used by the Stripe Terminal SDK to connect to a reader.

Related guide: [Fleet Management](https://stripe.com/docs/terminal/fleet/locations).

location.description: The id of the location that this connection token is scoped to. Note that location scoping only applies to internet-connected readers. For more details, see [the docs on scoping connection tokens](https://stripe.com/docs/terminal/fleet/locations#connection-tokens).

object.description: String representing the object's type. Objects of the same type share the same value.

secret.description: Your application should pass this token to the Stripe Terminal SDK.

title: TerminalConnectionToken
